page.title: 10Alternative Medicine
page.content: The Osteopathic profession deals not only with the treatment of muscular derangements but with a wide range of health problems, by means of detection and correction of faulty structure and function in the body. It accepts that self-healing is possible, provided there are favourable internal and external conditions, good nutrition and normal structural integrity. Chiropractice is based on the idea that misplaced spinal joints could impinge on the nerves, causing disease elsewhere in the body. Treatment is by high velocity thrust techniques, and increasing interest is in joint dysfunction causing back and neck pains, rather than the treatment of ill health. Manipulative therapy techniques are used to improve physical joint and muscle dysfunction, mechanical functions, by massage.
